str2: A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.
Forty. The decade of tessares; forty.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

word: are going to raise it up
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
